description: This file contains integration tests for the reasoning_content generation feature using ThinkingTools within the agno project. It verifies that reasoning_content is properly populated in the response object during both streaming and non-streaming modes.

methods.name: test_thinking_tools_non_streaming
methods.description: Tests that reasoning_content is populated in the response when using ThinkingTools in non-streaming mode.

methods.name: test_thinking_tools_streaming
methods.description: Tests that reasoning_content is populated in the response when using ThinkingTools in streaming mode.
